00040 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042 extern  void CaenVmeManual(long, short) ; 
00043 
00044 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048 /*
00049     -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051       Main program
00052 
00053     -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 */
00055 
00056 
00057 int main(int argc, void *argv[]) 
00058 
00059 {
00060 CVBoardTypes  VMEBoard;
00061 short         Link;
00062 short         Device;
00063 int32_t       BHandle;
00064 
00065 
00066 
00067 if( (argc != 3) && (argc != 4) )
00068     {
00069     printf("Usage: CAENVMEDemo V1718 <VMEDevice>\n");
00070     printf("       CAENVMEDemo V2718 <VMEDevice> <VMELink>\n");
00071     exit(1);
00072     }
00073 else 
00074     {
00075     if( strcmp((char*)argv[1], "V1718") == 0 )
00076         {
00077         if( argc == 3 )
00078             {
00079             VMEBoard = cvV1718;
00080             Device = atoi((const char*)argv[2]);
00081             Link = 0;
00082             }
00083         else
00084             {
00085             printf("       CAENVMEDemo V1718 <VMEDevice>\n");
00086             exit(1);
00087             }
00088         }
00089     else 
00090         {
00091         if( strcmp((char*)argv[1], "V2718") == 0 )
00092             {
00093             if( argc == 4 )
00094                 {
00095                 Device = atoi((const char*) argv[2]);
00096                 Link = atoi((const char*) argv[3]);
00097                 VMEBoard = cvV2718;     
00098                 }
00099             else
00100                 {
00101                 printf("       CAENVMEDemo V2718 <VMEDevice> <VMELink>\n");
00102                 exit(1);
00103                 }
00104             }
00105         else
00106             {
00107             printf("Usage: CAENVMEDemo V1718 <VMEDevice>\n");
00108             printf("       CAENVMEDemo V2718 <VMEDevice> <VMELink>\n");
00109             exit(1);
00110             }
00111         }
00112 
00113     }
00114 
00115 // Initialize the Board
00116 
00117 if( CAENVME_Init(VMEBoard, Link, Device, &BHandle) != cvSuccess ) 
00118     {
00119     printf("\n\n Error opening the device\n");
00120     exit(1);
00121     }
00122 
00123 
00124 con_init() ;
00125 
00126 // CAENVME_SetFIFOMode(BHandle,1) ;
00127         
00128 CaenVmeManual(BHandle,1) ;
00129 
00130 con_end() ;
00131 
00132 CAENVME_End(BHandle);
00133 }
